title: What are two external and two internal obstacles to effective listening? - Quora

response.answer_text: The greatest external obstacle toward earthly human cognitive logical reasonable intelligent quality toward listening intelligently logically reasonably developed exists as the severe amount of present earthly human ignorance. The greatest internal obstacle toward earthly human acquiring cognitive intelligent logical reasonable quality of listening exists as the severe amount of present earthly human ignorance.
External: Being too far away. Having hearing issues. Internal: Not paying attention. Not Making note of key points.
